translation.en: Getting an early start on lunch?
translation.it: Sei già al lavoro per pranzo?

translation.en: Nope. I'm working on something new, butternut squash risotto for Christmas.
translation.it: No, lavoro a qualcosa di nuovo: risotto alla zucca per Natale.

translation.en: It sounds delicious.
Tried it last night, but the ingredient ratios were all messed up.
translation.it: L'ho provato ieri sera, ma le dosi erano sbagliate.

translation.en: Keep getting distracted.
By what?
So I'm partway through this painting, and I was finishing it in my head now.
translation.it: Sono a metà di un dipinto e lo stavo finendo nella mia testa.

translation.en: You can't let your painting be the cause of wasted food.
translation.it: Non devi sprecare cibo a causa della pittura.

translation.en: Right.
How would you like to rustle us up some breakfast?
translation.it: Che ne dici di prepararci una bella colazione?

translation.en: Can you make your father's smoked salmon scrambled eggs?
translation.it: Fai le uova strapazzate al salmone di tuo padre?

translation.en: I can. Can't make it as well as he did, though.
translation.it: Sì, anche se non so farle buone come le sue.

translation.en: Yes, you can.
Your father would be so proud of you
translation.it: Tuo padre sarebbe fiero di te

translation.en: the way you've just stepped in and made this restaurant your own.
translation.it: per come hai reso tuo questo ristorante.

translation.en: Smoked salmon it is.
You should paint a picture of yourself to go with your picture of your father.
translation.it: Fatti un ritratto da mettere accanto a quello di papà.

translation.en: I don't think so.
I didn't even want you to put up the photograph of me.
translation.it: Non ho voluto che appendessi nemmeno una mia foto.

translation.en: I'm no equal of Dad.
translation.it: Non sono al livello di papà.

translation.en: And it's pretty apparent that the customers agree.
translation.it: Ed è chiaro che i clienti concordano.

translation.en: Stop that.
It's getting steadily better, and Christmas is always great for us.
translation.it: Le cose stanno migliorando pian piano e a Natale lavoriamo sempre bene.

translation.en: Oh, I got to go to town and meet Ella to take care of something.
translation.it: Devo incontrare Ella per risolvere una cosa.

translation.en: -I'll be back for lunch service. -Just come back in time for Ella's shift.
translation.it: - Torno per il servizio di pranzo. - O per il turno di Ella.

translation.en: The staff can look after the kitchen for lunch. Have fun!
translation.it: Il personale baderà alla cucina. Divertiti!

translation.en: Thanks.
Why are we here?
This is my happy place.
You okay? The walls are empty.
translation.it: Ti senti bene? I muri sono spogli.

translation.en: Yeah, but can't you feel the artist creating art for the contest?
translation.it: Sì, ma non senti l'artista che crea arte per il concorso?

translation.en: If you say so.
You love creating dishes. That's your art.
translation.it: A te piace creare piatti. È la tua arte.

translation.en: I mean, I do too, but…
-You think I'm a good chef? -You're terrific.
translation.it: - Credi sia un buon chef? - Ottimo.

translation.en: Then why is this my happy place?
translation.it: E perché è questo il mio posto preferito?

translation.en: Because you have a soul of a painter.
translation.it: Perché hai l'anima di una pittrice.

translation.en: Soul of a painter?
Okay, I saw it in a movie, but it fit the moment, didn't it?
translation.it: Ok, l'ho visto in un film, ma ci stava bene, no?

translation.en: So where's your happy place?
You know, the restaurant.
The day you moved me from desserts to sous chef
translation.it: Quando mi hai promosso dai dessert a sous chef,

translation.en: was the second best day of my life.
translation.it: è stato il mio secondo giorno più bello.

translation.en: Well, I'm sure your husband would be happy to hear he beat sous chef.
translation.it: Tuo marito apprezzerà sapere che ha battuto la promozione a sous chef.

translation.en: Gabe supports my dreams. You need someone like that.
translation.it: Gabe incoraggia i miei sogni. Ti serve uno così.

translation.en: After the disaster that was Jeff, I'm fine alone.
translation.it: Dopo la storia disastrosa con Jeff, sto bene da sola.

translation.en: And I have a lot going on. I started painting again.
translation.it: E ho troppe cose per la testa. Ho ricominciato a dipingere.

translation.en: Well then…
you need to submit to the art festival.
translation.it: Devi partecipare al festival di arte.

translation.en: -That's why we're here. -Consider me shocked.
translation.it: - Per questo siamo qui. - Sono scioccata.

translation.en: I took over the restaurant about a year ago,
translation.it: Gestisco il ristorante da un anno

translation.en: and Mom said it's starting to come back, so I thought, "Why not?"
translation.it: e mia madre dice che ha ripreso piede, quindi ho pensato: "Perché no?"

translation.en: Do you ever wonder what would have happened
translation.it: Pensi mai a come sarebbe andata,

translation.en: if you went straight to art school after graduation
translation.it: se dopo la laurea avessi fatto la scuola d'arte,

translation.en: rather than sticking around the restaurant?
Well, Charlie's Kitchen isn't just a restaurant.
translation.it: Charlie's Kitchen è più di un ristorante.

translation.en: It's my family's lifeblood. I can never leave it behind. Especially now.
translation.it: È l'anima della famiglia. Non posso lasciarlo, soprattutto ora.

translation.en: If you're looking for support,
translation.it: Se cerchi un po' di sostegno,

translation.en: I absolutely believe you could win this art competition.
translation.it: io sono convinta che potresti vincere il concorso.

translation.en: Come on! You know it's true!
translation.it: E dai! Lo sai che è così!

translation.en: I started something.
It's very Christmas-y.
No, no, wait. I have a better idea. You could paint me.
translation.it: No, aspetta, ho un'idea migliore. Fammi un ritratto.

translation.en: I look very cute in Christmas outfits. [giggles]
I'll definitely win then. Absolutely. That's a great idea.
translation.it: Allora vincerò di sicuro. Certo. Ottima idea.

translation.en: -You should've told me this days ago. -I have all the good ideas.
translation.it: - Dovevi parlarmene giorni fa. - Ho solo ottime idee.

translation.en: [man] Knock knock.
You were supposed to call me when you got in so I could pick you up.
translation.it: Dovevi chiamarmi all'arrivo, sarei venuto a prenderti.

translation.en: I just grabbed a rideshare. It was easier than bothering you.
-Ooh! -Good to see ya.
Having you here for Christmas is, like, the best thing ever.
translation.it: Averti qui per Natale è una cosa davvero fantastica.

translation.en: It's a double win for me.
I get to see your new place and spend the holidays with you.
translation.it: Vedo la casa nuova e passo le feste con voi.

translation.en: -Mm. -Bayside is a big change from New York.
translation.it: Bayside è molto diversa da New York.

translation.en: Yeah, and that's exactly how we like it.
translation.it: Sì, è per questo che a noi piace.

translation.en: Hey, I hope you're okay with this whole garage vibe.
translation.it: Ehi, spero che l'allestimento in stile garage ti vada bene.

translation.en: -No. -You know, I hope this works.
It's different from what you're used to but--
translation.it: So che sei abituato a ben altro…

translation.en: Works for me. I started out in the garage.
translation.it: Mi va bene. Ho iniziato in un garage.

translation.en: One more picture to finish and then I'm yours until the next corporation calls.
translation.it: Finisco un disegno e sono vostro fino al prossimo lavoro.

translation.en: Score. Oh, hey.
I actually kept my old sketching desk from our days in New York.
translation.it: Ho tenuto il mio tavolo da disegno di quando stavamo a New York.

translation.en: And don't worry. Your original masterpiece is still intact.
translation.it: Tranquillo, il tuo capolavoro è ancora intatto.

translation.en: Wow.
Look at that. A stone-age cave drawing.
translation.it: Ma tu guarda. Un disegno dell'età della pietra.

translation.en: Whoa! This is a Wyatt Graham original. How much do you think I could get for it?
translation.it: Ehi! Questo è un Wyatt Graham originale. Quanto pensi che potrei ricavarne?

translation.en: My originals are computer-generated these days,
translation.it: Ora creo i miei disegni al computer.

translation.en: so unless we can find a hotel lobby this will work in,
translation.it: O troviamo la hall di un hotel dove ci stia bene,

translation.en: I don't think anyone's going to be interested, but enough about me, come on.
translation.it: o non interesserà a nessuno. Ma basta parlare di me. Dai.

translation.en: Yeah, not quite.
Cheryl is going to need a lot more,
and she's definitely going to ask about Michelle.
translation.it: e ti chiederà sicuramente di Michelle.

translation.en: And I'm going to tell her what I tell everyone else.
translation.it: E io le dirò quello che dico a tutti.

translation.en: She wanted to settle down. I wasn't ready.
translation.it: Lei voleva sistemarsi e io non ero pronto.

translation.en: Not ready to stop traveling?
I love the places I get to go.
translation.it: Mi piacciono i posti che visito.

translation.en: I'm just… I'm not artistically satisfied.
translation.it: È solo che come artista non sono soddisfatto.

translation.en: I used to use pencils to create my drawings
and now everything is computer-generated.
translation.it: e ora è tutto generato al computer.

translation.en: There's no human element to the finished product anymore.
translation.it: Il prodotto finale non ha più nessun elemento umano.

translation.en: I get it, and so…
I've gone ahead and done something.
translation.it: Nel frattempo ho fatto una cosa.

translation.en: [chuckles] What did you do?
I have entered you in the City Christmas Art Festival.
translation.it: Ti ho iscritto al festival di arte di Natale della città.

translation.en: -Hmm. -So it's time to put up or get mad at me.
translation.it: Mettiti sotto, o arrabbiati con me.

translation.en: Or maybe… maybe thank you.
translation.it: O magari è ora di ringraziarti.

translation.en: Hey, what are friends for?
translation.it: Ehi, a che servono gli amici?

translation.en: The contest is Christmas-themed.
translation.it: Il concorso è a tema natalizio.

translation.en: So I was thinking, hey, you know, you could just enter this,
translation.it: Stavo pensando che potresti presentare questo,

translation.en: and then you don't have to create anything new.
translation.it: così non devi crearne uno nuovo.

translation.en: Nah, no way. It's a lot to process, but I love a challenge.
translation.it: No, figurati. Ci dovrò riflettere su, ma adoro le sfide.

translation.en: And, hey, it could be fun.
[David] All right.
I'll need supplies.
I got you covered on that. There's a shop downtown.
translation.it: L'ho fatta io. Il negozio è in centro.

translation.en: -Perfect. -Let's go get some food.
Okay.
[David] I got this.
-Hey, welcome back. -I just came in to drop Ella off.
I forgot my work shoes so I need to go home.
translation.it: Ho le scarpe da lavoro a casa.

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -It's okay. Hurry back.
translation.it: - Mi dispiace. - Fa niente. Torna subito.

translation.en: -Hey, Patrick. -Charlotte, boy, am I glad to see you.
translation.it: - Ciao, Patrick. - Charlotte, sono felice di vederti.

translation.en: -I got a question for you. -Sure. What's up?
There's been a hiccup in the Christmas festival planning.
translation.it: C'è stato un intoppo riguardo al festival.

translation.en: Is there a chance that Charlie's Kitchen could come on as our official restaurant?
translation.it: Credi che il Charlie's Kitchen possa farci da ristorante ufficiale?

translation.en: Really? What happened?
I thought Home Cooking was doing it this year and every year.
translation.it: Credevo ci fosse Home Cooking, come ogni anno.

translation.en: Yeah, well, Brenda hurt her back, and she's out for at least two weeks.
translation.it: Brenda si è fatta male alla schiena. È a riposo per due settimane.

translation.en: -Oh. -I need someone and thought of you first.
translation.it: Ho bisogno di aiuto e ho pensato a te.

translation.en: Well, thank you for that, but--
Not all of the events need food. Just three of them.
translation.it: Serve cibo solo per tre degli eventi.

translation.en: Just the opening holiday party, the Christmas Art Festival Showcase,
translation.it: La festa di apertura, la mostra di arte di Natale

translation.en: and the Yuletide Gala.
Um… Well, you know, I love the festival, but the opening's tomorrow.
translation.it: Beh, lo sai, io adoro il festival, ma l'apertura è domani.

translation.en: I would be grateful for whatever you put together, it doesn't have to be fancy.
translation.it: Apprezzerei qualunque cosa riuscissi a fare, nulla di raffinato.

translation.en: I just… I don't have anyone else I trust to handle this on such late notice.
translation.it: Non conosco nessun altro di cui mi fidi, con così poco preavviso.

translation.en: Yes?
I mean, I'm sure my mom would love the publicity for the restaurant.
translation.it: Mia madre gradirebbe la pubblicità al ristorante.

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you, thank you, thank you.
You have no idea how much this means. You are saving the day.
translation.it: Non sai quanto sei d'aiuto. Salverai la situazione.

translation.en: Is your mom in the back?
Yeah, she is. Tell her I said yes?
translation.it: Sì, le dici che ho accettato?

translation.en: Thanks, Charlotte.
No.
Hey, what are you doing?
I'm fixing the picture. Can't have a messed-up Santa at Christmas.
translation.it: Sistemo il disegno. Babbo Natale dev'essere a posto, per Natale.

translation.en: Oh, really?
Yeah, whoever drew this is pretty good too.
translation.it: Sì, chi l'ha disegnato è stato bravino.

translation.en: -Pretty good? -Absolutely.
Is there something that you'd do differently?
Maybe I would put a Christmas tree right here in the background.
translation.it: Forse avrei messo un albero di Natale qui.

translation.en: Hmm. I'd prefer a sleigh.
Yes, but the public would be expecting a sleigh.
translation.it: Sì, ma quella uno se l'aspetterebbe.

translation.en: Plus, I get to decorate a tree.
You? [scoffs]
My board, my decorations.
translation.it: La mia lavagna la decoro io.

translation.en: I might let you draw a tree 'cause I can always erase it.
translation.it: Potrei farti disegnare un albero perché poi posso cancellarlo.

translation.en: And you are?
The pretty good artist.
Oh, well, in that case, I'll just take the tree.
translation.it: Ah, in tal caso, mi accontento dell'albero.

translation.en: Okay, Rembrandt, but if you mess it up, you got to answer to the owner.
translation.it: Ok, Rembrandt, ma se fai un pasticcio, ne rispondi alla proprietaria.

translation.en: Which I'm guessing is probably you.
Yep.
Well, I'm willing to chance it.
Hey, artist at work.
My board.
Okay. Your turn.
Artist at work.
Okay. You're better than pretty good.
-So are you. -Well, thank you.
-And you are? -I'm Wyatt.
-Charlotte. -Your restaurant? Any good?
translation.it: - Charlotte. - È il tuo ristorante? Si mangia bene?

translation.en: It is! I'm also the head chef. You're invited to try it.
translation.it: Sì, e sono anche lo chef. Ti invito a provarlo.

translation.en: Sounds good to me. I'd love to try.
translation.it: Per me va bene. Mi piacerebbe.

translation.en: Right now, I'm just headed to the craft store, but…
this was fun.
-I'll be seeing you, Charlotte. -Hope so.
-Merry Christmas. -Merry Christmas.
Right, shoes.
One quick touch-up.
-Hey, Ella. -[Ella] Hey.
Are you coming back anytime soon?
Uh, yeah. I'll be right there. I'm sorry, I'm sorry.
It's really good to see you again. Happy holidays.
translation.it: È un piacere rivedervi. Buone feste.

translation.en: -You made the shoes? -Sorry, I got distracted.
translation.it: - Hai fatto tu le scarpe? - Scusa, un intoppo.

translation.en: [Ella] Distracted with painting?
Your mom wants to talk to us about some big news.
translation.it: Tua madre ha grosse novità per noi.

translation.en: -I already know all about it. -Am I being promoted?
translation.it: - So già tutto. - Avrò una promozione?

translation.en: -Am I finally your boss now? -You already got a promotion.
translation.it: - Ora sono il tuo capo? - Un'altra?

translation.en: Oh, well, I'm impatient.
Don't wish for too much because Mom's news is going to tax your cooking skills.
translation.it: Attenta, quelle novità testeranno le tue doti culinarie.

translation.en: Huh, yeah. Good, that's news I want to hear.
translation.it: Ah, sì, bene. Proprio le novità che volevo sentire.

translation.en: The art festival has last-minute food needs, and we have been asked to save the day.
translation.it: Il festival di arte ha un'urgenza e ci hanno chiesto di risolverla.

translation.en: -I thought-- -Brenda hurt her back.
translation.it: - Ma non… - Brenda ha mal di schiena.

translation.en: The Yuletide Gala will be here?
translation.it: Il gala di Yuletide si fa qui?

translation.en: Yep, on the 22nd. Plus, two more events.
translation.it: Sì, il 22. Più altri due eventi.

translation.en: The Gala means out-of-town reporters, articles, blogs.
translation.it: Il gala significa giornalisti da fuori, articoli e blog.

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -People all over the country see them.
-This could put us on a bigger map. -I know it could be nice.
translation.it: - Potremmo farci conoscere. - Sì, non male.

translation.en: We have to hit the ground running. The opening party is tomorrow.
translation.it: Dobbiamo metterci al lavoro. La festa di apertura è domani.

translation.en: So we'll meet here in the morning. Early.
translation.it: Ci vedremo qui al mattino. Presto.

translation.en: And for now, let's get on that dinner rush. Come on.
translation.it: E per ora, pensiamo al servizio di cena. Diamoci da fare.

translation.en: I couldn't sleep. I saw the light on.
translation.it: Non dormivo. Ho visto la luce accesa.

translation.en: Why are you still up?
I'm just unwinding, fooling around.
translation.it: Mi rilasso un po', passo il tempo.

translation.en: Don't stay up all night.
translation.it: Non stare qui tutta la notte.

translation.en: I am worried about tomorrow. I need you to be fresh.
translation.it: Sono preoccupata per domani. Ti voglio in forma.

translation.en: I'll be fine.
I'm sorry, I don't mean to push,
but could this… project wait until tomorrow?
translation.it: ma questo progetto non può aspettare fino a domani?

translation.en: -Sure-- -Or after the festival?
-Oh, absolutely. -That would be better.
Okay.
Thank you. I'm counting on you.
Of course. You can always count on me.
translation.it: Certo. Puoi sempre contare su di me.

translation.en: Good night.
-What you got there? -Free Christmas decorations.
Who's going to argue with free?
You know, people around here always go all out for the holidays.
translation.it: La gente di queste parti non bada a spese per le feste.

translation.en: Yeah, I noticed.
And what's… what's this?
Oh, it's just something by the box, I think someone was just throwing it out.
translation.it: Era accanto alla scatola. Credo che volessero buttarlo.

translation.en: [Wyatt] No, this is half-finished.
Just toss it then.
-I don't think so. -You want to keep it?
translation.it: - Non ci penso proprio. - Vuoi tenerlo?

translation.en: Yeah.
Okay.
Are you really okay with all this extra work?
translation.it: Ti sta bene il lavoro extra?

translation.en: Why wouldn't I be?
I figured both work and getting your painting done for the contest would be too much.
translation.it: Pensavo che lavorare e finire il quadro sarebbe stato troppo.

translation.en: -How are you going to do both now? -Don't worry about me.
translation.it: - Come farai con entrambi? - Non preoccuparti.

translation.en: The restaurant has my complete attention.
You submitted it already?
Nope, I threw it away.
-You what? -Mm-hmm.
You need me. My mom needs me. Everyone needs me.
translation.it: Tu e mia madre avete bisogno di me. Come tutti gli altri.

translation.en: -It's for the best. -No, it's not. Come on.
translation.it: - È meglio così. - No, invece. E dai.

translation.en: Look, as much as I love painting,
last night, I saw how overwhelmed my mom was with all of this.
translation.it: ieri sera ho visto quanto era preoccupata mia madre.

translation.en: If she can't sleep, then it's serious. So work over hobbies, right?
translation.it: Se lei non dorme, è una cosa seria. Il lavoro prima degli hobby, giusto?

translation.en: I don't want you to do something you're going to regret.
translation.it: Non voglio che tu te ne penta in futuro.

translation.en: No, it's… it's for the best.
translation.it: No, è… È la cosa migliore.

translation.en: Well, look who it is.
Oh, hi. This is a nice surprise.
translation.it: Oh, ciao. Ma che bella sorpresa.

translation.en: -Are you offering caricatures? -No.
translation.it: - Ti offri per fare caricature? - No.

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Don't mind if I do.
translation.it: - Ti offri per fare caricature? - No. Posso?

translation.en: Thank you.
Oh, that's good.
You know what else is really good? That painting.
translation.it: Sai cos'altro non è niente male? Quel quadro.

translation.en: You okay? You look like you've seen the ghost of Christmas past.
translation.it: Ehi! Hai visto lo spirito del Natale passato?

translation.en: -Worse. -What happened?
Nothing. I'm okay. I just-- I hallucinated.
I mean, like, I hope I hallucinated.
Oh, I get it.
Seeing everyone else's artwork out there isn't easy.
translation.it: Vedere esposte le opere altrui non è facile.

translation.en: Next year is going to be your year, okay?
translation.it: Il prossimo sarà il tuo anno, ok?

translation.en: We should get back to serving food.
-Would you like some more wine? -Oh, no, thanks.
Are you okay? Did I do something to upset you?
translation.it: Tutto ok? Per caso ti ho urtato?

translation.en: You just disappeared.
You're Wyatt… Graham, the architectural artist?
translation.it: Tu sei Wyatt Graham, l'artista di architettura?

translation.en: -You've heard of me? -I have a coffee table book of your work.
translation.it: - Mi conosci? - Ho un tuo libro illustrato in salotto.

translation.en: You must like hotel lobbies.
I like art.
So do I.
You know, I find it really strange
that the only art with your name on it isn't even yours.
translation.it: che l'unica opera firmata da te in realtà non sia tua.

translation.en: I'm not trying to steal anyone's thunder. I'm going to submit my own work.
translation.it: Non voglio i meriti altrui. Presenterò il mio lavoro.

translation.en: I just… I love what there is of this.
translation.it: Ma ha qualcosa che mi piace.

translation.en: You don't happen to know who the artist is, do you?
translation.it: Non è che per caso sai chi è l'artista?

translation.en: Yeah, I do. And you should take it down.
translation.it: Sì, lo so. E dovresti toglierlo.

translation.en: If the artist wants to tell me in person, I'd be happy to.
translation.it: Se l'artista me lo chiede di persona, lo farò.

translation.en: Let's just say the artist threw it away for a reason.
translation.it: Diciamo solo che l'artista l'ha buttato via per un motivo.

translation.en: I can't imagine what would make an artist throw out a work like this.
translation.it: Non capisco come si possa buttare un quadro così.

translation.en: I can.
Even half finished, there's nothing like it in here.
translation.it: Pur essendo incompiuto, qui non c'è niente di simile.

translation.en: Everyone's talking about it.
Well, it would be better if they were talking about the food.
translation.it: Beh, sarebbe meglio se parlassero del cibo.

translation.en: Charlotte, we are making a great impression up there.
translation.it: Charlotte, le cose stanno andando benissimo.

translation.en: -Everyone seems to love the food. -All thanks to your and Ella's work.
translation.it: - Sembra che tutti amino il cibo. - Grazie al lavoro tuo e di Ella.

translation.en: Well, it's the job, Mom. It's… my only focus right now.
translation.it: Beh, è il mio lavoro, mamma. Il mio unico pensiero, al momento.

translation.en: That's why you're the best.
Good night. Thanks so much for coming.
Well, I think we pulled it off.
translation.it: Beh, sembra sia andato tutto bene.

translation.en: And I'd say the food was pretty perfect.
translation.it: E aggiungerei che il cibo era perfetto.

translation.en: -Oh, thank you. -I got to say, you look amazing.
translation.it: - Grazie. - Devo dire che sei splendida.

translation.en: Oh, stop it.
Well, it has been a while since I've been this dressed up.
translation.it: Beh, era un bel po' che non mi mettevo in ghingheri.

translation.en: Oh, well, then I need to host a few more of these.
I was wondering, are you coming to the Color Me Christmas event tomorrow?
translation.it: Verrai all'evento Colora il Natale di domani?

translation.en: I wasn't planning on it.
Charlotte's the artist, I'm the numbers gal.
translation.it: Charlotte è l'artista, io tengo i conti.

translation.en: Oh, that's too bad.
Thought you might use it as another opportunity to promote your restaurant.
translation.it: Sarebbe un'altra opportunità per promuovere il ristorante.

translation.en: Lots of out-of-towners never heard of Charlie's Kitchen.
translation.it: Con tanti forestieri che non lo conoscono.

translation.en: You've got a point.
-Just think about it. -I'm thinking.
Well, I hope I see you tomorrow, Molly. Good night.
translation.it: Beh, spero di vederti domani, Molly. Buonanotte.

translation.en: What was that about?
He wants me to go to Color Me Christmas.
translation.it: Di andare a Colora il Natale.

translation.en: Really? You should definitely go.
Well, I would be promoting the restaurant if I brought some of our hot spice cider.
translation.it: Farei pubblicità al ristorante, se portassi il nostro sidro speziato.

translation.en: That works. Business and some pleasure.
translation.it: Buona idea. Lavoro e un po' di svago.

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Just business.
If you say so.
Okay, Wyatt.
What do we draw?
-Hi. -Sorry, we don't open for another… hour.
translation.it: - Ciao. - Mi dispiace, apriamo tra un'ora.

translation.en: I was just taking a walk and I thought, "olive branch."
translation.it: Stavo passeggiando e ho pensato di porgere un ramoscello d'ulivo.

translation.en: Last night I gave you the wrong impression about why I hung the painting up.
translation.it: Forse ti ho dato un'idea sbagliata sul perché ho appeso quel quadro.

translation.en: I'm listening.
I wasn't trying to take credit away from the artist.
I was just trying to spotlight the art that spoke to me.
translation.it: Volevo mettere in luce l'arte che mi ha colpito.

translation.en: Well, I love that it spoke to you,
but what if the artist isn't interested in having the art seen?
translation.it: ma se l'artista non volesse esporre la sua arte?

translation.en: That's a fair question, but why wouldn't they be?
translation.it: Domanda lecita, ma perché non dovrebbe?

translation.en: It's complicated.
I hear the next event is some public painting thing today.
translation.it: Oggi c'è una sessione di pittura in pubblico.

translation.en: You want to come with me?
I'm not much of a painter and maybe you can give me some pointers.
translation.it: Non sono un gran pittore, puoi darmi qualche dritta.

translation.en: I'll think about it.
Can't ask for more than that.
I'll head over early and save you a seat just in case.
translation.it: Andrò un po' prima e ti terrò il posto, non si sa mai.

translation.en: The mystery man you were hanging around with last night has followed you here?
translation.it: L'uomo misterioso con cui eri ieri sera ti ha seguito fin qui?

translation.en: His name is Wyatt.
He's a well-known artist.
He seems like a… interesting guy, but, um…
But what?
But we have unfinished business.
Oh, like your unfinished painting hanging at the gallery?
translation.it: Tipo il tuo quadro incompiuto esposto alla galleria?

translation.en: I'd know your style anywhere.
Well, only you, and now Wyatt, know that.
translation.it: Beh, tu e Wyatt siete gli unici a saperlo.

translation.en: I should have known you wouldn't throw it out.
But I did. I threw it in the trash.
translation.it: Ma l'ho fatto. Era nella spazzatura.

translation.en: I don't even know how he got his hands on it.
translation.it: Non so come abbia fatto a recuperarlo.

translation.en: I'm failing to see the problem. Based on what I heard, you could win.
translation.it: Non vedo il problema. Da quanto ho sentito, potresti vincere.

translation.en: It's a half-finished painting,
nothing that I'd want anyone seeing in its current form.
translation.it: che non vorrei mai mostrare così com'è.

translation.en: With the restaurant responsibilities, I can't finish it if I wanted to.
translation.it: Con gli impegni del ristorante, non potrei finirlo nemmeno volendo.

translation.en: I just-- I'm going to take it down.
-I am. -You had a chance to last night.
translation.it: - Proprio così. - Potevi farlo ieri sera.

translation.en: Well, people were talking,
translation.it: Beh, c'era gente che ne parlava

translation.en: and I, you know, like, I didn't want to…
Take it down.
Well, I do now.
Well, I think you should accept the nice artist man's invitation today,
translation.it: Dovresti accettare l'invito per oggi del bell'artista,

translation.en: even if it is to tell him you want your painting back.
translation.it: anche se è per dirgli che rivuoi il quadro.

translation.en: Can I at least know more about him?
There's… there's nothing to say.
Tell me you don't want to know more about him.
translation.it: E non vuoi sapere qualcosa di lui?

translation.en: I already know about him.
Well, I mean, I know what he does for a living.
translation.it: Beh, so cosa fa per vivere.

translation.en: Like, I mean, I know his career.
I don't know him personally, but it's the same…
translation.it: Non lui come persona, ma è la stessa…

translation.en: You must want to know more because you're talking in circles.
translation.it: Vuoi sapere qualcosa di lui, perché ci stai girando attorno.

translation.en: Okay, I'll go if it'll make you happy,
translation.it: Ok, ci vado, se così sei contenta,

translation.en: but only to tell him that I'm taking the painting down.
translation.it: ma solo per dirgli che toglierò il quadro.

translation.en: Yeah.
Just for that reason.
-Yep. -Just for that.
Not bad.
I thought I heard you coming in.
What are you doing home and dressed like that?
translation.it: Cosa fai a casa e vestita così?

translation.en: Ella has the kitchen covered today so I was going to Color Me Christmas.
translation.it: Ella oggi si occupa della cucina, così vado a Colora il Natale.

translation.en: Oh, you are such a good daughter.
I could use a second set of hands with the spice cider.
translation.it: Mi servirebbe una mano con il sidro speziato.

translation.en: Oh, I'm happy to help.
translation.it: Oh, sono felice di dare una mano.

translation.en: I'll take care of the cider.
You know, if you are looking this good, I should step up my game too.
translation.it: Lo sai, dato che tu sei così carina, forse io dovrei alzare la posta in gioco.

translation.en: I'm sure Patrick would like that.
He never crossed my mind.
translation.it: L'idea non mi ha nemmeno sfiorato.

translation.en: Right, right.
Oh, you just…
Charlie's Kitchen cider?
Enjoy.
So my invitation was just too irresistible to pass up.
translation.it: Il mio invito era troppo irresistibile per decidere di declinarlo.

translation.en: You got lucky, I was working.
-It's a nice place to work. -Mm-hmm.
I love the boats.
Yeah, it's an outdoor boat museum. They're part of the town's history.
translation.it: Sono la storia della città. È un museo all'aperto.

translation.en: You know, your station here looks like it's self-sufficient. Why not come join me at an easel?
translation.it: La tua postazione sembra autosufficiente. Perché non vieni con me ai cavalletti?

translation.en: I should really stay here.
People can figure out how to fill their own cups.
-Okay, wise guy. Let's go. -All right.
I warn you, though, using a brush is way different than using a pencil.
translation.it: Ma ti avviso, usare un pennello non è come usare una matita.

translation.en: -[Charlotte] Ready for your lesson? -I am.
Wait, it's turning into, like, a watercolor.
-Yeah, that should work. -All right.
So get some green.
[Wyatt] Green, green.
-All right. -No.
You hold it like this.
-Oh. -Yeah.
-Almost like a pencil. -Kind of.
-All right. -Just let the brush do the work, okay?
translation.it: - Bene. - Lascia che il pennello scorra.

translation.en: -Hold on. -How's that?
-[Charlotte] Here, just let me… -Sure.
Close your eyes.
Just feel it.
Yeah! Look, you can do it.
Hey, you made it.
I did.
They really like our cider.
Yeah, we've had a lot of folks in and out today.
translation.it: Sì, oggi c'è stato un bel viavai.

translation.en: I saw a lot of people over here so that's good.
translation.it: Avete avuto un sacco di gente, è un bene.

translation.en: Well, thank you for inviting us to do this.
translation.it: Beh, grazie per averci voluto qui.

translation.en: You should go look at what Charlotte is painting.
translation.it: Dovresti vedere il quadro di Charlotte.

translation.en: She has a talent.
She likes to paint.
It's a good release for her, I guess.
translation.it: Per lei è una valvola di sfogo.

translation.en: It's been fun spending this holiday time with you.
translation.it: È stato bello stare un po' con te in queste feste.

translation.en: I'd have to agree.
So, what big city do you live in?
translation.it: Allora, in quale grande città vivi?

translation.en: Well, what makes you think I'm from a big city?
translation.it: Perché credi che viva in una grande città?

translation.en: -Really? -[laughs]
All right, New York,
translation.it: E va bene. A New York,

translation.en: but I travel so much for each gig, I can barely say I live there.
translation.it: ma viaggio per ogni incarico, non passo lì molto tempo.

translation.en: And you came to Bayside, why?
translation.it: E perché sei venuto a Bayside?

translation.en: To visit my good friend, David.
He's the one who encouraged me to enter the art contest.
translation.it: Mi ha incoraggiato lui a partecipare al concorso.

translation.en: You mean enter someone else into the art contest?
I'm going to enter.
I just haven't figured out what I want to draw yet.
translation.it: Devo solo capire cosa voglio disegnare.

translation.en: Well, Bayside has some beautiful buildings.
translation.it: Beh, Bayside ha dei bellissimi edifici.

translation.en: I'm tired of architectural drawing.
Well, I like them.
They're so precise, so…
Dry? Unemotional?
-Do they move you? -Yes.
I love them.
Well, I… I always thought they were cold.
translation.it: Beh, io ho sempre pensato che fossero freddi.

translation.en: I mean, I want to bring warmth and life to my work.
translation.it: Voglio mettere calore e vitalità nel mio lavoro.

translation.en: Like your work.
Even half painted, your work shows so much more than mine.
translation.it: Anche se non è finito, il tuo lavoro è più espressivo del mio.

translation.en: No, but thank you.
Believe me, I know where you're coming from, though.
So many people have been dictating what I create for them.
translation.it: Tutti mi impongono cosa creare per loro.

translation.en: I just-- I want to create something for myself.
translation.it: Io voglio creare qualcosa per me stesso.

translation.en: Well, there's nowhere more inspirational than Bayside at Christmas.
translation.it: Beh, niente può ispirarti di più di Bayside a Natale.

translation.en: I'll be first in line to see what you submit.
-Really? -Mm-hmm.
Okay. Well, what about you?
translation.it: Ok, e cosa mi dici di te?

translation.en: You are clearly a talented artist.
Why are you working as a chef?
Sometimes being there for your family is what's most important.
translation.it: A volte l'importante è sostenere la propria famiglia.

translation.en: Well, if only someone would understand the value of chasing your dreams.
translation.it: Bisognerebbe capire il valore dell'inseguire i propri sogni.

translation.en: You're dreaming if you think you're gonna finish that by dark.
translation.it: Tu sogni, se pensi di finirlo entro oggi.

translation.en: -More painting, less talking. -Okay.
translation.it: - Più pennellate e meno chiacchiere. - Ok.

translation.en: Charlotte, that is so pretty.
[Charlotte] Thank you.
-Okay. Be honest. -Okay.
Uh… It's good.
Ah. You know, tomorrow's festival event is Kringle's Krafts in the art gallery.
translation.it: L'evento di domani è il Kringle's Krafts alla galleria d'arte.

translation.en: You could do a demonstration with pencil.
You know, try out some ideas on the people there?
translation.it: Puoi provare delle idee coi presenti.

translation.en: I bet you they would love to see you work.
Seriously? I haven't drawn with a pencil in a while.
translation.it: Sul serio? Non disegno a matita da un po'.

translation.en: You could do it. And Patrick would love it.
translation.it: Puoi farcela. E Patrick sarebbe entusiasta.

translation.en: Would you come?
[clicks tongue] I just might, after work.
I'm holding you to that.
You know, I think I'm gonna go burn this now.
translation.it: Penso che ora questo lo brucerò.

translation.en: -No! -Yeah.
-See you at Kringle's Krafts tomorrow? -Tomorrow. Bye.
translation.it: - Ci vediamo al Kringle's Krafts? - Sì.

translation.en: Bye.
He looks nice.
Oh, he has a name?
Yeah, he knows mine too.
translation.it: Sì, e anche lui sa il mio.

translation.en: That's a good start.
I am so glad you're getting back out there.
translation.it: Sono felice che ti rimetta in gioco.

translation.en: That is very nice. Very nice.
-Hey, man. -[Wyatt] Hey.
I thought I'd add a little more Christmas cheer in here
translation.it: Ho pensato di aggiungere un leggero tocco natalizio

translation.en: to help get those creative juices flowing.
Love it.
Did you fish another painting out of the trash?
No, this one's all mine.
But you were blindfolded, right?
I had my eyes closed for part of it, but I'm not a painter.
translation.it: Per lo più avevo gli occhi chiusi. Mica sono un pittore!

translation.en: Let's see that. Okay.
Then why did you paint this?
Have you and Cheryl already had dinner?
translation.it: Tu e Cheryl avete già cenato?

translation.en: I was thinking about getting takeout from Charlie's Kitchen.
-It's good food. -Yeah.
And between you and me,
the chef there turned out to be the creator of that painting you found.
translation.it: lo chef è l'artista del quadro che hai trovato.

translation.en: Okay, I like where this is going.
-So, chef, huh? -Yeah.
You going there for the food or you're going to see her?
translation.it: Vai lì per il cibo o ci vai per vedere lei?

translation.en: Both.
-[Wyatt] Hello. -Hi.
Is it too late to place an order before closing?
translation.it: È troppo tardi per ordinare qualcosa?

translation.en: Of course not, but we need to talk.
translation.it: Certo che no, ma dobbiamo parlare.

translation.en: Have a seat.
I'm sorry. Have we met?
No. No, I'm Ella. I'm Charlotte's best friend,
translation.it: No, io sono Ella, la migliore amica di Charlotte.

translation.en: and she's not here right now, which is good for us.
translation.it: Lei ora non c'è, il che per noi è un bene.

translation.en: Look, I don't know how you ended up with Charlotte's painting,
translation.it: Non so come hai avuto il quadro di Charlotte,

translation.en: but you clearly thought it was something special if you submitted it to the festival.
translation.it: ma ci hai visto qualcosa di speciale e l'hai presentato al festival.

translation.en: -It is. She's a rare talent. -Mm-hmm.
And she finally decided to enter the contest this year
translation.it: Si era finalmente decisa a partecipare,

translation.en: until you cut her off at the knees.
translation.it: finché tu non le hai segato le gambe.

translation.en: I didn't know that, but she also threw the painting out.
translation.it: Non lo sapevo. Però lei ha buttato via il quadro.

translation.en: Well… there is that.
But I was going to talk her back into entering and…
translation.it: Ma le avrei parlato per convincerla a iscriversi,

translation.en: that's going to be harder to do with that half-finished painting hanging there.
translation.it: e sarà più difficile, con quel quadro incompiuto alla galleria.

translation.en: Hmm. What do you suggest?
Let her take it down if that's what she wants to do.
translation.it: Lascia che lo tolga, se è ciò che vuole.

translation.en: You know, I can do with some more friends like you.
translation.it: Mi servirebbero degli altri amici come te.

translation.en: I'm glad you understand.
-I love Charlotte. -I like her too.
translation.it: - Ci tengo a Charlotte. - Sì, mi piace.

translation.en: Thought so.
Now, will that be dine-in or takeout?
translation.it: Allora, mangi qui o porti via?

translation.en: Takeout?
Takeout.
Hey.
So, I was thinking about the Gala.
We really need to shine, you know, bring our A-game.
translation.it: Dobbiamo fare faville e dare il meglio di noi.

translation.en: So I thought Christmas: something new, something different.
translation.it: Tema natalizio, qualcosa di nuovo e originale.

translation.en: Butternut squash risotto. Hm?
Sure you want to do something new instead of what we know our customers love?
translation.it: Ti fidi a fare un piatto nuovo e non ciò che i clienti amano?

translation.en: Hundred percent.
-Honey? -Hmm?
What's going on?
You know, it's just a lot of things.
translation.it: Beh, sai, un sacco di cose.

translation.en: My responsibilities here, I mean, which is my priority.
translation.it: Le mie responsabilità qui, che sono la mia priorità.

translation.en: I'm also enjoying the company of a man who's about to leave town.
translation.it: Mi piace la compagnia di un uomo che presto lascerà la città.

translation.en: I have conflicted feelings about that.
And I just want to express myself through my paintings.
translation.it: Vorrei esprimere me stessa attraverso la pittura.

translation.en: I'm just feeling…
Overwhelmed.
You don't think I can manage?
translation.it: Dici che non ce la farò?

translation.en: I don't think anyone could handle this.
It's Christmas season, the restaurant is picking up,
translation.it: Siamo sotto Natale, il ristorante che decolla,

translation.en: the festival…
And you need to go see that man again before he leaves.
translation.it: E devi rivedere quell'uomo prima che parta.

translation.en: As far as your painting goes,
well, when this is all over, I'm sure you can fit it in.
translation.it: quando qui sarà tutto finito, troverai il tempo.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, maybe I can.
Okay. Now, I want to taste that risotto.
translation.it: Ok, ora voglio assaggiare il risotto.

translation.en: Yeah, not this one 'cause it burned while we were talking.
translation.it: Beh, non questo perché è bruciato mentre parlavamo.

translation.en: Oh, okay, okay, okay.
Okay, I'm just going to go.
Hi. I'm glad you're here.
I'm so sorry I missed the show. We had a later-than-usual lunch service.
translation.it: Scusa se ho perso la dimostrazione. A pranzo abbiamo finito tardi.

translation.en: -I like it. -[Wyatt] Yep.
-I saved the last bit just for you. -Me?
translation.it: - L'ultimo tocco spetta a te. - A me?

translation.en: Mm-hmm. You showed me brush technique. The least I can do is show you a little pencil technique.
translation.it: Tu mi hai insegnato a usare il pennello. Io ti mostrerò come usare la matita.

translation.en: Okay, what am I doing exactly?
Well, Santa wouldn't be complete without his belt.
translation.it: Beh, Babbo Natale deve avere la sua cintura.

translation.en: All you have to do is darken the lines.
It's great. Just close your eyes and feel it.
translation.it: Molto bene. Chiudi gli occhi e cerca di sentirla.

translation.en: Nice.
I have to admit, using a pencil is different than a paintbrush.
translation.it: Devo ammettere che usare la matita è diverso dall'usare il pennello.

translation.en: Feels great to draw again.
Um… Can I-- Can I ask you a favor?
Sure.
I've been putting together samples for my submission piece
translation.it: Ho buttato giù degli schizzi per il concorso.

translation.en: and was hoping you could look at them.
I could really use an honest opinion.
translation.it: Ho bisogno di un parere sincero.

translation.en: I'd love to.
-Really? -Mm-hmm.
Th-That's great.
-Well, let's go do that. -Okay.
Whoa!
This is my workspace while I'm here.
translation.it: Ecco dove lavoro, mentre sto qui.

translation.en: Oh, hey. I thought I saw you come in.
translation.it: Ciao. Mi sembrava di averti visto arrivare.

translation.en: -You must be David? -Yes.
-I'm Charlotte. -Nice to meet you…
You're the chef from Charlie's Kitchen.
translation.it: Tu sei lo chef del Charlie's Kitchen.

translation.en: I am.
I love your grilled shrimp. It is the best.
translation.it: I tuoi gamberi grigliati sono i migliori.

translation.en: -Well, thanks. -Yeah, and thank you, by the way.
translation.it: - Grazie. - Sì, e grazie a te, a proposito.

translation.en: I hear that you're the reason that this guy has gotten into drawing again.
translation.it: Pare che tu sia la ragione che ha spinto lui a disegnare di nuovo.

translation.en: I just suggested it. He did the rest.
translation.it: Gliel'ho solo suggerito. Lui ha fatto il resto.

translation.en: Well, I got to head to the store, so it was very nice meeting you.
translation.it: Beh, devo andare al negozio. Mi ha fatto piacere conoscerti.

translation.en: See you later, buddy.
He's probably my oldest friend.
translation.it: È il mio più vecchio amico.

translation.en: Keeps me grounded. Just moved here, actually.
translation.it: Mi tiene coi piedi per terra. Si è appena trasferito qui.

translation.en: Well, he'll be here awhile then. People who move here don't leave.
translation.it: Allora resterà. Chi si trasferisce qui non va più via.

translation.en: Good to know.
I just started drawing things that sparked my interest.
translation.it: Ho iniziato a disegnare soggetti che mi hanno colpito.

translation.en: What do they have in common?
Honestly, I don't know.
Well, you said you travel a lot for work,
so maybe your submission could be about places you visited?
translation.it: potresti presentare qualcosa sui luoghi che hai visto?

translation.en: I don't really get to explore much while I'm working.
translation.it: Non vedo molto, nei viaggi di lavoro.

translation.en: As soon as I'm finished, it's on to the next.
translation.it: Appena finisco, passo a quello successivo.

translation.en: My mom's favorite chair.
She sat in that every Christmas while we opened up presents.
translation.it: Si sedeva lì ogni Natale mentre aprivamo i regali.

translation.en: I like it.
This record player is cool.
My mom, she was a singer with a great career.
translation.it: Mia madre era una cantante di successo.

translation.en: She traveled all over the country from gig to gig,
translation.it: Si è esibita in tutto il paese,

translation.en: even performed at Carnegie Hall.
And that's where she met my father.
He was in the orchestra there.
So did you gain any of their musical abilities?
translation.it: Hai ereditato qualcosa del loro talento musicale?

translation.en: Hm. I can clap my hands to most songs?
translation.it: So battere le mani a tempo per quasi tutte le canzoni.

translation.en: You ever travel with them?
Uh… No.
Once I came around, they taught at a local college and that was it.
translation.it: Quando sono nato io, insegnavano in un'università locale.

translation.en: Stopped touring.
-Do you think they regretted it? -Yeah.
I mean, I don't know. I would have.
translation.it: Cioè, non lo so. Io li avrei avuti.

translation.en: I love my career.
I thought you said that you weren't satisfied?
Yeah, maybe that was the wrong choice of word.
translation.it: Sì, forse mi sono espresso male.

translation.en: It's more like I'm unfulfilled.
translation.it: Direi più che non sono appagato.

translation.en: You know, I'd rather be drawing by hand.
Instead, I use a computer to create the architecture of choice
translation.it: Invece uso il computer per creare le architetture prescelte

translation.en: for corporate headquarters or hotels.
translation.it: per le sedi d'azienda o gli hotel.

translation.en: And they pay me. It beats having a real job.
translation.it: E mi pagano. È meglio di un lavoro normale.

translation.en: Like being a chef.
You know, I didn't mean it that way.
Um… Cooking is an art form, isn't it?
translation.it: Cucinare è una forma d'arte, no?

translation.en: Sure. It can be.
For me, it's a job.
translation.it: Per me è solo un lavoro.

translation.en: Which is why you should be painting instead of cooking.
translation.it: Motivo per cui dovresti dipingere, invece di cucinare.

translation.en: Easy for you to say, world-traveling artist.
translation.it: Per te è facile dire così, artista giramondo.

translation.en: I don't think I could do what you do.
translation.it: Non so se potrei fare come te.

translation.en: Nothing brings me peace like being at home, especially at Christmas.
translation.it: Niente mi dà pace come essere a casa, specialmente a Natale.

translation.en: Yeah. I agree with that.
-Which is why I'm here. -Mm-hmm.
Spend Christmas with David and with new people.
translation.it: Per passare il Natale con David e con persone nuove.

translation.en: You know, um, I… I don't think these are all that random after all.
translation.it: Sai, alla fine non credo che questi disegni siano così casuali.

translation.en: I bet you have a story about how each of these
translation.it: Scommetto che ognuno ha una storia

translation.en: was a part of your home growing up.
Like the rocking chair?
Has anyone ever told you you're very good at changing the subject?
translation.it: Ti hanno detto che sei brava a cambiare argomento?

translation.en: I have a Girl Scout patch in it.
translation.it: Mi hanno dato un premio scout.

translation.en: But look!
Yeah, you might be right.
Maybe I can do something with this.
About the painting in the gallery.
Yeah, it's… it's okay. You don't have to explain.
translation.it: Sì, non importa. Non devi darmi spiegazioni.

translation.en: Look, you're a talented artist and it wasn't my place to submit your work.
translation.it: Hai talento, e non spettava a me presentare il tuo lavoro.

translation.en: It's your painting and if you want to take it down, you don't need my permission.
translation.it: È il tuo quadro, e se vuoi toglierlo non ti serve il mio permesso.

translation.en: I know.
So?
I'm taking it down.
Hey, Charlotte.
Is everything okay?
Uh… I need to talk to you.
Yeah, of course.
So, the anonymous painting?
It's mine and I decided to take it down.
translation.it: È mio, e ho deciso di toglierlo.

translation.en: Wyatt knows about it.
It's yours?
Charlotte, I love it.
That painting stands a good chance of winning the competition.
translation.it: Quel quadro ha buone probabilità di vincere.

translation.en: Are you sure you want to do this?
Yes, I'm sure.
All right.
All right, well, if you change your mind,
you'll just have to resubmit it with a new application.
translation.it: puoi riproporlo con una nuova iscrizione.

translation.en: But using my own name, right?
translation.it: Ma usando il mio nome, giusto?

translation.en: Good point.
Submissions close on the day of the awards ceremony, the 23rd.
translation.it: La scadenza è il giorno della premiazione, il 23.

translation.en: I hope you submit something.
You have real talent.
Nope.
-[David] Hello! -Hey.
Hey.
So, uh… how's it coming?
-[sighs] I'm still working on it. -Mm.
Uh… You left this inside on the table.
You missed a call… from London.
translation.it: Hai una chiamata persa da Londra.

translation.en: Thanks.
So you and Charlotte?
Yeah, I asked her to give me input on my festival submission.
translation.it: Sì, le ho chiesto degli spunti per il concorso.

translation.en: Sure.
No, really. Charlotte has an inspired approach to art.
translation.it: No, sul serio. Ha un approccio brillante all'arte.

translation.en: Please tell me there's something else to this other than "an inspired approach to art."
translation.it: Ti prego, dimmi che c'è altro, oltre a "un approccio brillante all'arte".

translation.en: -Of course there is. -Okay.
She's fun, and she's different, and she's smart.
She might even understand my dreams better than I do.
translation.it: Forse capisce i miei sogni meglio di me.

translation.en: I just don't know how I can make that work.
translation.it: Ma non so come far funzionare le cose.

translation.en: Try this: take her on a real date.
Spend Christmas with her. Don't prejudge.
translation.it: Passa il Natale con lei. Senza preconcetti.

translation.en: Just realize you have a lot of time to think about this.
translation.it: Hai un sacco di tempo per rifletterci.

translation.en: My constant travel doesn't really leave room for meaningful relationships.
translation.it: I miei continui viaggi non lasciano spazio a relazioni stabili.

translation.en: You know it killed my last one.
I do.
But people approach things differently and will change for the right person.
translation.it: Ma le persone hanno approcci diversi e cambiano per la persona giusta.

translation.en: My job isn't going to change.
Just be open to it, okay?
The call?
Oh, yeah.
London.
Yes, I understand, but I'm not in a position to give you an answer right now.
translation.it: Sì, lo capisco, ma al momento non posso darle una risposta.

translation.en: Let me get back to you.
Thank you for the offer.
-Whoa. -What's the scoop?
The Hotel Magnifique could use my services.
They want to commission drawings for all of their hotels.
translation.it: Vogliono commissionarmi i disegni per tutti gli hotel.

translation.en: All of them.
That's at least a six-month to a year job in London.
translation.it: Sono da sei mesi a un anno di lavoro a Londra.

translation.en: -Big money? -Yeah.
Wow.
What are you going to do?
They want to fly me down right after Christmas.
translation.it: Vogliono che vada là subito dopo Natale.

translation.en: What?
One thing's for sure… their timing stinks.
translation.it: Una cosa è certa: il loro tempismo fa schifo.

translation.en: Charlotte.
What-- What are you doing here?
Were you up all night?
You took it down.
Yeah, I saw something in it. I didn't intend to finish it.
translation.it: Sì, ci ho visto qualcosa. Non volevo finirlo.

translation.en: I just wanted to do that one thing. I just-- I couldn't stop.
translation.it: Volevo fare un ritocco e non sono riuscita a fermarmi.

translation.en: It's not done yet.
Your mom sent me to wake you up.
translation.it: Tua madre mi ha mandato qui.

translation.en: -She did? -She wanted to let you sleep.
Well, I did all the prep work.
-I must've slept past my alarm. -It's okay.
translation.it: - Ho perso la sveglia. - Fa nulla.

translation.en: -I'm so, so, so sorry. -Oh, no, it's okay!
translation.it: - Mi dispiace un sacco. - No, non importa!

translation.en: Oh, so glad you're back. We're starting to get busy.
translation.it: Bene, eccovi qua. Inizia a esserci da fare.

translation.en: We're on it. I will take the crab cakes.
translation.it: Io prendo i tortini di granchio.

translation.en: Okay, I will take that.
Honey, that's sugar. Are you trying something new?
translation.it: Tesoro, quello è zucchero. Fai qualcosa di nuovo?

translation.en: Oh, no. I just grabbed the wrong…
translation.it: Ah, no. Ho solo sbagliato a prendere…

translation.en: It doesn't matter.
Uh, Charlotte, why don't we take five?
Ella, kitchen's yours.
Okay?
-I'm sorry I was late. -Figured I'd let you sleep.
translation.it: - Scusa il ritardo. - Ti ho fatto dormire.

translation.en: I was in the studio painting. I just felt so inspired.
translation.it: Ero nello studio a dipingere. Ero davvero ispirata.

translation.en: I really needed it.
Is this about Wyatt?
Maybe.
Yes, um, but it's also about me.
translation.it: Sì, ma si tratta anche di me.

translation.en: I'm just not ready to talk about it yet.
translation.it: Ma non sono pronta per parlarne.

translation.en: Okay, well…
you know I'm here if you need me.
translation.it: Sai che per te ci sono, se vuoi.

translation.en: Thanks, Mom. I'm ready to get back to cooking.
translation.it: Grazie, mamma. Sono pronta a tornare in cucina.

translation.en: Okay.
Is everything all right?
I wish I knew.
Tried giving her support, space, room to breathe.
translation.it: Ho provato a sostenerla e a lasciarle i suoi spazi.

translation.en: And look at her. She's more lost than ever.
translation.it: E ora guardala. È più smarrita che mai.

translation.en: Believe me, she's far from lost.
I think she's finding her way.
translation.it: Credo stia imboccando la sua strada.

translation.en: Really?
I sure hope so.
Trust me. All Charlotte wants to do is make you proud.
translation.it: Fidati di me. Charlotte ci tiene a renderti fiera.

translation.en: [Patrick] Welcome.
Welcome to the annual Christmas Art Festival Showcase.
translation.it: Benvenuti alla mostra annuale del festival di arte di Natale.

translation.en: Now, this year, our chosen artists are going to be decorating trees.
translation.it: Quest'anno, gli artisti prescelti decoreranno degli alberi.

translation.en: So, watch as they create Christmas magic before your very eyes.
translation.it: Osservateli mentre davanti a voi creano la magia nel Natale.

translation.en: Let the festivities begin!
You really outdid yourself this year, Patrick.
The gallery looks fabulous. And I love the tree decorating.
translation.it: La galleria è splendida. Bell'idea, quella di decorare gli alberi.

translation.en: Well, thank you.
And people are really talking about the food too.
translation.it: E si parla molto anche del cibo.

translation.en: And business is up, thanks to you and my daughter.
translation.it: Gli affari sono migliorati, grazie a te e a mia figlia.

translation.en: Speaking of Charlotte, I have an idea I'd like to run by you.
translation.it: A proposito di Charlotte, ho un'idea di cui vorrei parlare con te.

translation.en: Looking to decorate that tree too?
-Can you do it by computer? -Stop that.
Yeah, I'm looking at all the art on the walls
and some of this work is seriously impressive,
but nothing from my favorite artist yet.
translation.it: ma non vedo l'artista che preferisco.

translation.en: Doesn't mean I'm not working on it.
Because of you, I am finishing my painting. -That's great. -Mm-hmm.
translation.it: - A causa tua, sto finendo il mio quadro. - Magnifico.

translation.en: I, on the other hand, am still unsure of what I want to draw.
translation.it: Io invece non so ancora cosa disegnare.

translation.en: Okay, I'm finding that very hard to believe.
Can't a guy fish for more help from his favorite artist?
translation.it: La mia artista preferita può aiutarmi?

translation.en: I'd be grateful for any ideas.
In that case, I know just the place to help you get fresh ideas
translation.it: In tal caso, conosco il posto dove puoi trovare idee nuove

translation.en: and shake you out of that funk.
Meet me after I'm done here?
-Can't say no to that. -Perfect.
[Charlotte] You should check out the ornaments.
-[Wyatt] Are they all personal? -They are.
[Charlotte] Every person writes down something they're grateful for every year.
translation.it: Ogni abitante di Bayside scrive qualcosa per cui è grato.

translation.en: Reminds us that we're not going through life alone, you know?
translation.it: Ci ricorda che in questa vita non siamo da soli.

translation.en: And it's also tradition for couples to put up a joint ornament each year.
translation.it: Ed è anche tradizione per le coppie mettere un addobbo comune.

translation.en: And have you ever put up an ornament with anybody?
translation.it: Hai mai appeso un addobbo con qualcuno?

translation.en: I have. His name was Jeff.
I won't be putting up another ornament with him.
translation.it: Non ne appenderò un altro con lui.

translation.en: What happened?
We both grew up together here, and he couldn't wait to get out,
translation.it: Siamo cresciuti qui insieme e lui non vedeva l'ora di andarsene.

translation.en: and I needed to be here.
He finally left a few Christmases ago.
translation.it: È andato via un paio di Natali fa.

translation.en: You've never wanted to leave?
My mom needs me right now.
translation.it: Mia madre ha bisogno di me.

translation.en: Well, I'd love to see what ornament you put up this year.
translation.it: Vorrei vedere il tuo addobbo di quest'anno.

translation.en: You think you can find it?
-I think so. -All right. [laughs]
Let's take a look.
Warmer.
Cold. Cold.
Freezing, freezing, freezing.
-"Flavor"? -Yeah, flavor. Seasoning.
I'm grateful for everything in my life.
translation.it: Sono grata per ciò che ho.

translation.en: For the flavor everyone brings to it.
translation.it: Per il sapore che tutti danno alla mia vita.

translation.en: Well, if it means anything, you've already added flavor to my life.
translation.it: Se può interessarti, hai già aggiunto sapore alla mia.

translation.en: Goes both ways.
So, do they let visitors participate?
-Any unclaimed ornament can be yours. -Okay.
translation.it: - Puoi prendere uno di quelli rimasti. - Ok.

translation.en: You okay?
Yeah. I'm great.
Okay.
"Christmas in Bayside"?
It brought me here to see my friend David
translation.it: Mi ha portato qui dal mio amico David

translation.en: and gave me something personal, and I'm grateful.
translation.it: e mi ha donato qualcosa di personale di cui sono grato.

translation.en: So my plan coming here worked?
translation.it: La mia idea di venire qui ha funzionato?

translation.en: Better than you could ever know.
You want to share?
Hmm… Not yet.
And I'm grateful that Christmas in Bayside introduced me to you.
translation.it: Sono grato che il Natale a Bayside mi abbia fatto conoscere te.

translation.en: You know, there's this awesome hot chocolate stand.
translation.it: Sai, c'è un magnifico chiosco di cioccolata calda.

translation.en: Lead the way.
[Charlotte] Wyatt, you in there?
-I did it. -Hey, someone had their morning coffee.
translation.it: - Ce l'ho fatta. - Ehi, qualcuno è sotto caffeina.

translation.en: I finished my painting.
It's amazing.
I couldn't wait for you to see it.
Can I see yours?
Um… Not… not yet.
I'm going to be late to the restaurant, but I couldn't wait for you to see it.
translation.it: Farò tardi al ristorante, ma volevo che lo vedessi.

translation.en: -I love it. -I'll see you later?
-Yeah, sure. -Okay.
Yay! [laughing]
Oh, good that you're here.
We were just discussing how to freshen up events,
translation.it: Parlavamo di come rinnovare gli eventi

translation.en: and I thought with such fabulous chefs on my team,
translation.it: e pensavo che con i magnifici chef che ho in squadra,

translation.en: why not make tomorrow's open day a Christmas Cookie Decorating event?
translation.it: domani potremmo fare un evento di decorazione di biscotti.

translation.en: Show families that art can be tasty too.
translation.it: Per mostrare alle famiglie il gusto dell'arte.

translation.en: I like it, but I wanted to talk to you first.
translation.it: A me l'idea piace, ma prima volevo parlarne con te.

translation.en: Well, as long as we have a day to prepare, I'd love to.
translation.it: Se abbiamo un giorno per prepararci, mi piacerebbe molto.

translation.en: We could host it here between lunch and dinner when we're closed?
translation.it: Possiamo farlo qui, tra pranzo e cena?

translation.en: That'd be okay with you?
Like you don't want to make cookies.
translation.it: Lo so che vuoi fare i biscotti.

translation.en: I already have ideas.
That's great! I'll fire up the publicity machine and fill this place up.
translation.it: Bene! Do il via alla pubblicità e riempiamo questo posto.

translation.en: I volunteer to get the ingredients. I know exactly how to do this.
translation.it: Io procuro gli ingredienti. So già cosa fare.

translation.en: -I'll go with you. -Okay!
Have fun!
Thank you for being so accommodating.
I know. It'll be fun.
I love Christmas cookies and this would be really good for the restaurant.
translation.it: Adoro i biscotti di Natale, e aiuterà molto il ristorante.

translation.en: You could invite Wyatt.
You read my mind.
Ella did most of the prep on the cookies. She was really, really in her element.
translation.it: Ella si è preparata per i biscotti. Era proprio nel suo elemento.

translation.en: -Should be fun. -Then I'll be there.
I wouldn't miss cookie instruction for anything.
Did you get any work done today? I did, and, you know, I'm feeling very inspired.
translation.it: - Oggi sei riuscito a lavorare? - Sì, e mi sento molto ispirato.

translation.en: Good.
Well, we have a full day tomorrow and I need my beauty rest, so…
translation.it: Domani abbiamo una giornata piena e mi serve il mio sonno di bellezza.

translation.en: -No, you don't. -Stop.
I wouldn't think of it.
-Wow. Nice crowd. You ready? -Mm-hmm.
[sighs] I'm doing it with Ella. I wouldn't dream of doing it without her.
translation.it: Lo faccio insieme a Ella, da sola non lo farei mai.

translation.en: Plus, she knows more about this than I do. I don't even know where to begin.
translation.it: E poi su questo è più ferrata. Io non saprei da dove iniziare.

translation.en: Maybe you could start by not wearing the ingredients.
translation.it: Inizia a non imbrattarti di ingredienti.

translation.en: Oh, my God. Thank you.
It's time to get started.
You got this.
Thank you all for being here. Such a turnout.
translation.it: Grazie di essere qui. Che affluenza!

translation.en: Look at all of these beautiful families!
Today, we are going to be decorating Christmas cookies
with Bayside's very own Chef Charlotte Williams!
translation.it: nientemeno che con lo chef di Bayside Charlotte Williams!

translation.en: Hi!
I'll be joined by dessert chef extraordinaire, Chef Ella.
translation.it: Mi affiancherà lo chef di pasticceria, la straordinaria Ella.

translation.en: Now, every table has fresh baked cookies courtesy of Ella,
translation.it: Ogni tavolo ha dei biscotti appena sfornati fatti da Ella,

translation.en: as well as different frosting colors and candies to suit your artistic vision.
translation.it: oltre a glasse di diversi colori e decorazioni per sbizzarrirvi.

translation.en: So, let's all start with our Christmas tree cookie.
translation.it: Iniziamo col biscotto a forma di albero di Natale.

translation.en: Do you guys all have one?
While there's no wrong way to frost a cookie,
translation.it: Si può glassare in tanti modi,

translation.en: there are a few techniques to create something special.
translation.it: ma ci sono tecniche per farlo in modo speciale.

translation.en: So, let's learn how to feather the frosting to create pine needles.
translation.it: Vediamo come lavorare la glassa per creare gli aghi di pino.

translation.en: What's wrong?
The event is running long and we still have dinner service.
translation.it: L'evento si sta dilungando e c'è il servizio di cena.

translation.en: I told them that I would be the bad guy and clear everyone out.
translation.it: Ho detto che farò io il cattivo e li manderò via.

translation.en: I don't want to cost you money.
We have a roomful of potential customers.
Let's see if they want to stay for dinner service.
translation.it: Vediamo se vogliono restare per cena.

translation.en: -That's genius. -[Molly] Half price!
Let's do it!
All right.
The fine folks here at Charlie's Kitchen
have asked if you'd all like to stay for half-price dinner.
translation.it: si chiede se vi andrebbe di restare per una cena a metà prezzo.

translation.en: What do you say? Anyone interested?
translation.it: Cosa ne dite? Qualcuno è interessato?

translation.en: I'll get the oven prepped and sauces started for dinner service.
translation.it: Preparo forno e salse per il servizio di cena.

translation.en: -I'll get the rest. -I got the menus.
translation.it: - Io preparo il resto. - Prendo i menù.

translation.en: And I will, uh, start setting tables.
translation.it: E io inizio a preparare i tavoli.

translation.en: Your wait staff just saw the crowd. They look pretty happy.
translation.it: I camerieri hanno visto i clienti. Sembrano felici.

translation.en: Great.
I don't think we've been officially introduced. I'm Molly, Charlotte's mom.
translation.it: Non ci hanno ancora presentato. Molly, la madre di Charlotte.

translation.en: I'm Wyatt, and I see where she gets her good looks.
translation.it: Wyatt, e capisco da chi ha preso i suoi bei lineamenti.

translation.en: -You can keep this one. -[Wyatt chuckles]
-So, anything I can do to help? -Do you know how to wash dishes?
translation.it: - Posso dare una mano? - Sai lavare i piatti?

translation.en: Our dishwasher just called in sick.
Bring it on.
[Molly] I love a full house.
That felt great.
Better get used to it.
This place is going to be packed again for the Gala tomorrow night.
translation.it: Domani ci sarà di nuovo l'assalto per il gala.

translation.en: I think we can handle it.
I'm excited. Our chance for some real press.
translation.it: Che emozione! Avremo una vera copertura stampa.

translation.en: So, how about a quick coffee before we call it a night? Hmm?
translation.it: Che ne dite di un caffè al volo prima di chiudere?

translation.en: -I think we all earned it. -I'll help you?
translation.it: - Ce lo siamo meritato. - Ti aiuto?

translation.en: Great night.
But I still have a lot of work to do when I get back to David's.
translation.it: Ma ho ancora da fare, quando torno da David.

translation.en: -I thought you were on a roll? -I am.
I just want it to be perfect.
Hey, you two.
I forgot to say I'd love an extra shot of espresso with mine.
translation.it: Ho dimenticato di dire che io lo preferirei forte.

translation.en: I'll go see if anyone else wants something special in theirs.
translation.it: Vedo se qualcuno ha altre richieste.

translation.en: [clears throat] I like him.
Me too.
-Well, I'd like to talk to you about him. -I'm sure you would.
translation.it: - Vorrei parlarti di lui. - Non ho dubbi.

translation.en: Okay, fine. I get it. New subject.
You still pulling all-nighters on your painting?
translation.it: Passi ancora le notti sul tuo quadro?

translation.en: No, I actually finished it last night, but I'm not submitting it.
translation.it: No, l'ho finito ieri sera, ma non lo presenterò.

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
I found something better to do with it.
I'm going to give it to Wyatt for Christmas.
translation.it: Lo regalerò a Wyatt per Natale.

translation.en: Now, let's get these coffees out there, right?
Come on. I got it.
Ella, Charlotte, get some rest.
We have a big day tomorrow.
-Wyatt, I hope we'll see you there? -I wouldn't miss it.
translation.it: - Wyatt, ci vediamo lì? - Non mancherei mai.

translation.en: We're going to take a walk.
Good night.
You went above and beyond for me and my family tonight.
translation.it: Stasera ci hai dato una grossa mano.

translation.en: All I did was washing dishes. You and Ella did all the heavy lifting.
translation.it: Ho solo lavato i piatti. Tu ed Ella avete fatto il lavoro pesante.

translation.en: So, did you decide what you're gonna draw?
I think you're going to like it.
That's all you're going to say? You're going to make me pry it out of you?
translation.it: Non mi dici altro? Devo strappartelo con le pinze?

translation.en: What is it?
Well, I can tell you it's better than I could have ever hoped.
translation.it: Posso dirti che è venuto meglio di quanto sperassi.

translation.en: -Okay. -You added what was missing.
translation.it: - Bene. - Tu hai aggiunto il pezzo mancante.

translation.en: Really? What?
Flavor.
That special inspiration only you could bring.
-Wow… -[chuckles]
And?
And what?
What is it? What are you drawing?
Okay, I get it. You're not talking.
translation.it: Ok, ho capito, non me lo dirai.

translation.en: Charlotte, I want you to know I've been happier this past week
translation.it: Charlotte, volevo dirti che in questa settimana sono stato felice

translation.en: than I've been in a very long time.
translation.it: come non mi capitava da tanto tempo.

translation.en: Me too.
Okay, I need the right red. The right red.
translation.it: Bene, mi serve il rosso giusto.

translation.en: Christmas red.
You talk to yourself a lot when you paint?
What are you doing here?
Gabe suggested I come talk to you.
translation.it: Gabe mi ha suggerito di parlarti.

translation.en: Why?
He got tired of me telling him how worried I was about you.
translation.it: Era stufo di sentirmi dire che ero preoccupata per te.

translation.en: He has a point.
I've been trying to set you up with guys since Jeff,
translation.it: Cerco di sistemarti con qualcuno da Jeff,

translation.en: and I'm worried you've fallen for someone who's gonna leave.
translation.it: e temo che ti innamori di qualcuno che se ne andrà.

translation.en: And, you know, he is leaving.
I mean, it has occurred to me.
-But! -But what?
But I think we actually have something here,
translation.it: Ma penso che tra noi ci sia qualcosa

translation.en: and I want to believe that he would actually want to stay.
translation.it: e voglio credere al fatto che lui voglia rimanere.

translation.en: Honey!
He got me painting like I did when I first discovered it.
translation.it: Mi ha fatto ricominciare a dipingere come un tempo.

translation.en: He did this!
This is more than my happy place.
It's… it's where I belong.
translation.it: È una cosa che fa parte di me.

translation.en: -I've known that for quite some time. -You could have told me.
translation.it: - Lo so ormai da tempo. - Potevi dirmelo.

translation.en: Is there really more than one color red?
translation.it: Esiste davvero più di un rosso?

translation.en: So what I'm looking for is Rosso Corsa red? A bright, beautiful, brilliant Christmas red.
translation.it: Cerco il rosso corsa. È un bellissimo rosso brillante natalizio.

translation.en: It's a funny name.
-Italian sports car red. -Oh, pardon me.
translation.it: - Rosso come le auto sportive italiane. - Ah.

translation.en: -I have a tube here somewhere. -I'll help you find it.
translation.it: - Dovrei averne un tubetto. - Ti aiuto.

translation.en: Wait.
I don't want to keep you, we have to prep for the Gala in the morning.
translation.it: Tu vai pure, domattina c'è il gala da preparare.

translation.en: We do, but first we need to find your red.
translation.it: Sì, ma prima troviamo il tuo rosso.

translation.en: -What's it called again? -[Charlotte giggles]
Nope.
Hey, buddy. I'm heading to bed. Can I get you anything?
translation.it: Ehi, io vado a letto. Hai bisogno di qualcosa?

translation.en: Nah, you've done more than enough.
You know, I'm watching your work,
and it just reminds me of the loft in New York.
translation.it: mi torna in mente la mansarda di New York.

translation.en: [chuckles] Crazy Wyatt working until the middle of the night.
translation.it: Wyatt il Pazzo che lavorava fin nel cuore della notte.

translation.en: You know, I feel like Crazy Wyatt.
translation.it: Mi sento un po' come Wyatt il Pazzo.

translation.en: Yeah, well, women can do that to you.
translation.it: Sì, beh, le donne ti fanno questo effetto.

translation.en: Yeah, she is the nicest person I've ever met.
translation.it: Sì, e lei è la persona più dolce che abbia mai incontrato.

translation.en: -Mm. -And I've been a lot of places.
I guess it would be safe to say that you found your muse?
translation.it: Immagino si possa dire che hai trovato la tua musa.

translation.en: I think more.
Oh, wow.
[Wyatt] Not bad, huh?
-Great work, buddy. Great work. -[chuckles]
What are you doing?
Making your butternut squash risotto. I added a few extras of my own.
translation.it: Faccio il tuo risotto alla zucca. Con qualcosina in più.

translation.en: I never did finish a good version of this.
translation.it: Non ne ho mai completato uno.

translation.en: I just kept getting distracted and messing it up.
translation.it: Continuavo a distrarmi e a rovinarlo.

translation.en: Well, your heart wasn't in it, but I love the idea, plus it turned out amazing.
translation.it: Beh, non ci hai messo il cuore, ma adoro l'idea ed è venuto benissimo.

translation.en: Here, try.
This is incredible. We need to serve this tonight.
With an herb chicken breast.
We making progress?
We were discussing what to serve tonight at the Gala.
translation.it: Parlavamo di cosa servire al gala.

translation.en: And?
Ella's butternut squash risotto with herb chicken is Christmas on a plate.
translation.it: Il risotto di Ella con pollo alle erbe è perfetto per Natale.

translation.en: -Ella's? -Really?
Really. This is your happy place.
translation.it: Davvero. Questo è ciò che ti rende felice.

translation.en: Well, it's your call. You're the head chef.
translation.it: Beh, sei tu lo chef. Decidi tu.

translation.en: I will get back to decorating so you can cook.
translation.it: Io torno agli addobbi, così voi cucinate.

translation.en: You have no idea what this means to me.
translation.it: Non sai quanto significhi per me.

translation.en: Trust me. I absolutely do.
Thank you.
You concentrate, you get the perfect delicious chicken.
translation.it: Lo fai ridurre e viene un pollo delizioso.

translation.en: -Been cooking chicken since I was ten. -You've been painting since you were nine.
translation.it: - Lo cucino dai dieci anni. - E dipingi dai nove.

translation.en: -You need to tell your mother. -I know.
translation.it: - Devi dirlo a tua madre. - Lo so.

translation.en: -You can't tell them apart. -That's the point.
I learned from the best. You are a terrific cook.
translation.it: Ho imparato dalla migliore. Sei una grande cuoca.

translation.en: Sometimes the student surpasses the teacher.
translation.it: A volte l'allievo supera il maestro.

translation.en: Trouble?
Email from my friend in London.
Double the money of the original offer
translation.it: Mi offrono il doppio dei soldi

translation.en: and first-class tickets to London the day after Christmas.
translation.it: e un volo di prima classe per Londra il 26.

translation.en: Whoa.
Well, you're going to have to answer them.
Yeah, I know.
I can't believe it, there is not a sour face in the room.
translation.it: Incredibile, nessuno sembra avere una faccia scontenta.

translation.en: At this rate, we are guaranteed to be in every article and blog.
translation.it: Di questo passo, finiremo in ogni articolo e in ogni blog.

translation.en: Do you think they'll want my photo? Do I look okay?
translation.it: Pensi che vorranno la mia foto? Come sto?

translation.en: You look beautiful.
And if they don't want your picture, I do.
translation.it: E se loro non la vogliono, la voglio io.

translation.en: We just might have pulled it off.
There's not one plate with a single grain of rice left on it.
translation.it: Non hanno lasciato nemmeno un chicco di riso.

translation.en: All thanks to you. You made the right call.
translation.it: Grazie a te e alla tua intuizione.

translation.en: Thanks.
Sorry to interrupt.
I'll go check in with your mom and see if there's anything else.
