translation.it: Vado a chiedere a tua madre se c'è altro da fare.

translation.en: I know I'm probably not supposed to be back here now,
translation.it: So che forse non potrei stare qui,

translation.en: but I need to talk to you.
No, I'm glad you are. There are dishes to wash.
translation.it: No, ne sono felice. Ci sono i piatti da lavare.

translation.en: Absolutely. Grab me an apron.
I'm kidding. We have help, but I love that you were so ready to go.
translation.it: Scherzo. C'è il personale, ma apprezzo che fossi già ai nastri di partenza.

translation.en: Unfortunately, that's why I'm here.
I have a job in London after Christmas,
translation.it: Ho un lavoro a Londra dopo Natale

translation.en: and I wanted to be completely transparent with you.
translation.it: e volevo essere del tutto sincero con te.

translation.en: I also wanted to ask if you would wanna--
No, no, it's fine. It's… it's fine.
Like… it's not that I wasn't expecting this.
translation.it: Non posso dire che non me l'aspettassi.

translation.en: I mean, it's just a bit more abrupt and direct than I was expecting.
translation.it: Voglio dire, è solo un po' più brusco e diretto di quanto mi aspettassi.

translation.en: But you're you.
You're… you're great.
You're in demand.
Um… I'll be fine. I…
translation.it: Sei molto richiesto. Io me la caverò.

translation.en: I'm fine.
-Uh… Are you staying for the contest? -Charlotte!
-They want a photo of all three of us. -Not right now.
translation.it: - Vogliono una foto di noi tre. - Non ora.

translation.en: You made a huge difference in my life.
translation.it: Hai avuto un forte impatto sulla mia vita.

translation.en: Thank you for that.
What did you do?
Charlotte, wait. Look, I wasn't trying to hurt you.
translation.it: Charlotte, aspetta. Non era mia intenzione ferirti.

translation.en: You didn't let me tell you the rest of my news.
Look, you have a "vagabond" life. I have a "find a place you love and stay" kind of life.
translation.it: Senti, tu hai una vita da vagabondo, e io vivo in un posto che amo.

translation.en: -Oil and water. -It doesn't have to be.
translation.it: - Siamo come acqua e olio. - Può essere diverso.

translation.en: Yeah, it does.
You know, for a moment there, I had dreams of you staying,
translation.it: Per un attimo ho sognato che tu restassi

translation.en: working from here.
I shouldn't have. I knew better.
translation.it: Non avrei dovuto. Sapevo che non sarebbe successo.

translation.en: But you did teach me something that I'm so grateful for.
translation.it: Ma mi hai insegnato qualcosa di prezioso.

translation.en: What was that?
That my art is something special.
translation.it: Che la mia arte è speciale.

translation.en: It is.
And I intend to keep pursuing it.
That's what I was trying to tell you. You can come with me.
translation.it: È quello che cercavo di dirti. Puoi venire con me.

translation.en: To London?
I'm hoping you'll say yes.
This could be your chance to start fresh as an artist without anything holding you back.
translation.it: Potresti iniziare una vita come artista senza che niente ti trattenga.

translation.en: Wyatt, this is my home.
But you're stuck here doing something with your life you don't love.
translation.it: Ma sei bloccata qui a fare qualcosa che non ami.

translation.en: No, I'm not.
Being a chef isn't my life. You helped me understand that.
translation.it: Essere uno chef non è la mia vita. Mi hai aiutato a capirlo.

translation.en: I'm an artist.
That's what I am.
But I can't go with you.
translation.it: Ma non posso venire con te.

translation.en: And if this London job is your dream that you need to follow,
translation.it: E se il lavoro a Londra è il sogno che tu vuoi inseguire,

translation.en: I don't get in the way of dreams.
I know how important they are.
-Charlotte, just… -Goodbye, Wyatt.
I wasn't expecting to see you here today, you know, after last night.
translation.it: Oggi non mi aspettavo di vederti qui, sai, dopo ieri sera.

translation.en: I wanted to talk to you, but your door was closed.
translation.it: Volevo parlarti, ma avevi la porta chiusa.

translation.en: I appreciate that.
That's my favorite.
But there are quite a few others in that studio of yours
translation.it: Ma nel tuo studio ce ne sono altri

translation.en: that are really quite beautiful.
Really? You noticed?
Of course I noticed. You're my daughter. I love everything you do.
translation.it: Ma certo. Sei mia figlia. Amo tutto ciò che fai.

translation.en: I always thought you considered them a hobby.
translation.it: Pensavo che lo considerassi un hobby.

translation.en: I did, and I am so sorry.
I have something I want to show you.
You leaving?
I am.
I took the London job. Just called and got an earlier flight.
translation.it: Ho accettato il lavoro a Londra. Ho anticipato il volo.

translation.en: What? Whoa, hang on. Whoa.
You're leaving before Christmas?
translation.it: Te ne vai prima di Natale?

translation.en: What about Charlotte? What about the contest?
The contest?
I started off doing it for me,
I ended up doing it for her and… now she's gone.
translation.it: poi alla fine lo stavo facendo per lei e ora lei non c'è più.

translation.en: Gone? Wait, hold--
What happened?
I told her about London.
When… when you got here, you were complaining to me
translation.it: Senti, quando sei arrivato qui, ti sei lamentato con me

translation.en: about how you felt like your art had become
translation.it: di come la tua arte fosse ormai

translation.en: this computer-generated business.
You weren't happy artistically.
Okay? But I've watched you since you got here.
translation.it: Ma ti ho osservato da quando sei arrivato.

translation.en: When you were making this, you were smiling.
Heck! Even when you weren't working on this, you were smiling.
translation.it: Diamine! Sorridevi anche quando non ci stavi lavorando.

translation.en: Do you know why that is?
No, I'll tell you why.
translation.it: No, e te lo dico io.

translation.en: It's not because of the art.
It's because of her.
-You know, I asked her to come with me. -Great.
translation.it: - Le ho chiesto di venire con me. - Bene.

translation.en: She said no.
And did she tell you why she said no?
This is her home.
This is where she wants to be.
Sometimes we just need to learn to get out of our own way, Wyatt.
translation.it: A volte dobbiamo imparare a non ostacolarci da soli, Wyatt.

translation.en: Just hold on to the things that make you happy.
translation.it: Tieniti strette le cose che ti rendono felice.

translation.en: Okay? Everything else is just going to fall into place.
translation.it: Ok? Tutto il resto si sistemerà.

translation.en: I tried.
Thank you for everything, man.
-Of course. -It's really good to see you again.
Come here.
Now…
I better go before…
translation.it: È meglio che vada, prima che…

translation.en: I don't know.
One more thing.
Make sure she gets this.
See you.
Hey, wait! What am I supposed to…
do with this?
Wait, did you…
Is this the unfinished painting that everyone's talking about?
translation.it: È il quadro incompiuto di cui parlano tutti?

translation.en: This is the one I threw in the trash.
And I'm really glad I did.
It is spectacular.
You really are a special talent.
I can't enter this one.
I won't.
I'm going to give it to Wyatt for Christmas.
translation.it: Lo darò a Wyatt per Natale.

translation.en: So I painted a different one.
It's called Christmas at Charlie's.
Honey, it is magnificent.
Mom.
I can't be both a painter and a head chef.
translation.it: Non posso essere sia una pittrice che uno chef.

translation.en: Believe me, I have tried.
I am sorry if the pressures of running the restaurant
translation.it: Mi dispiace se la pressione per la gestione del ristorante

translation.en: made you feel like you weren't allowed to follow your dreams.
translation.it: ti ha fatto pensare che non potevi inseguire i tuoi sogni.

translation.en: I don't regret one second of it.
It's our family's legacy.
The restaurant will be fine, and I will be fine.
translation.it: Il ristorante se la caverà, e anch'io.

translation.en: What I need most is for my daughter to do what she loves.
translation.it: La cosa di cui ho più bisogno è che mia figlia faccia ciò che ama.

translation.en: Now, I hope you're entering this one.
I most certainly am.
And I really want you to be at the awards ceremony.
translation.it: E voglio che tu venga alla cerimonia di premiazione.

translation.en: I need your support.
Okay, I'm going to go clear my head.
translation.it: Bene, vado a schiarirmi le idee.

translation.en: I'm going to go to the Christmas tree and add another ornament.
translation.it: Vado all'albero di Natale ad aggiungere un addobbo.

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry about Wyatt.
It's sad, but I'm a better person now that I knew him.
translation.it: È una cosa triste, ma conoscerlo mi ha reso una persone migliore.

translation.en: And I like that.
David, hi!
You're putting up an ornament, nice.
No. Um… no, no.
Uh… Wyatt left this at my place.
translation.it: Wyatt ha lasciato questa da me.

translation.en: I brought it to show you.
You know, he is more than grateful for you.
I mean, the drawing he did for the contest, you need to see it.
translation.it: Dovresti proprio vedere il disegno che ha fatto per il concorso.

translation.en: Where is it?
He left it at my place.
You know, I thought I had it all figured out before he got here.
translation.it: Pensavo di aver capito tutto, prima del suo arrivo qui.

translation.en: But I quit my job and I'm dedicating my life to painting.
translation.it: Ma ho lasciato il lavoro e mi dedicherò solo alla pittura.

translation.en: He gave that to me.
That's incredible.
Can I…
Can I show you what you gave to him?
translation.it: Posso mostrarti cos'hai fatto per lui?

translation.en: Well, what are we waiting on?
-Great. -[gasps]
Hold on.
He's not going to, like, jump out or anything, is he?
translation.it: Non è che sbuca fuori all'improvviso?

translation.en: No. No, he's gone.
Gone, like gone?
I thought he was going to at least stay to enter the contest.
translation.it: Pensavo che restasse almeno per il concorso.

translation.en: No. No, he left.
But…
not entirely.
He wanted you to have it.
I had no idea.
David, I… I can't accept this.
Why not?
Because every time I look at it, I just… will be reminded that he's gone.
translation.it: Perché ogni volta che lo guarderò mi ricorderà che se n'è andato.

translation.en: You know, he said you were his muse.
translation.it: Ha detto che tu sei stata la sua musa.

translation.en: Thank you.
I'm glad I got to see it. Thanks again. Merry Christmas.
translation.it: Sono felice di averlo visto. Grazie di nuovo. Buon Natale.

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Charlotte.
Just the person I'm looking for.
Hi.
I just wanted to make sure everything was back in order after the Gala last night.
translation.it: Controllo che sia tutto in ordine dopo il gala di ieri sera.

translation.en: Ella, what would I do without you?
translation.it: Ella, cosa farei senza di te?

translation.en: What would I do without all of this?
translation.it: Cosa farei io senza tutto questo?

translation.en: You have been a rock since you first got here,
translation.it: Sei stata una roccia fin da quando sei arrivata,

translation.en: and I think it's time you get the credit you deserve.
translation.it: ed è ora che tu abbia il dovuto riconoscimento.

translation.en: Charlotte has decided to pursue her painting,
translation.it: Charlotte ha deciso di dedicarsi alla pittura

translation.en: and I am in the market for a new head chef.
translation.it: e io sono alla ricerca di un nuovo chef.

translation.en: You are just what this restaurant needs. The job is yours if you want it.
translation.it: Sei ciò di cui il ristorante ha bisogno. Se vuoi, il posto è tuo.

translation.en: Yes! Yes, yes!
I just--
That was a position you wanted to keep in the family.
translation.it: che ci volessi qualcuno della famiglia.

translation.en: You don't think you're family?
translation.it: E tu credi di non farne parte?

translation.en: Are you kidding?
Now get your coat.
You and I have an awards ceremony to get ready for on Charlotte's request.
translation.it: Io e te abbiamo una cerimonia da preparare su richiesta di Charlotte.

translation.en: What about dinner service prep?
Oh, you have staff for that now. They know what to do.
translation.it: Ora ci pensa il personale. Sanno cosa fare.

translation.en: We'll be back before the first diner.
translation.it: Torniamo prima che arrivi un cliente.

translation.en: -[laughing] -Thank you!
I'm glad you changed your mind.
It's beautiful.
I called London back.
Turned down the job.
You did?
I sure did.
-I love it. It's amazing. -It's the reason I couldn't leave.
translation.it: - Lo adoro. È splendido. - Non potevo andarmene, e per un motivo.

translation.en: The reason I drew it.
I can't stop thinking about you.
I can't stop thinking about you either.
And this.
This right here.
This is your heart on a canvas.
translation.it: Hai messo il cuore sulla tela.

translation.en: You're meant to do this.
So are you.
-Charlotte and Wyatt? I thought… -[Patrick] Is something wrong?
translation.it: - Charlotte e Wyatt? Pensavo… - Qualcosa non va?

translation.en: Apparently not.
I have so many questions, but I know better than to ask right now.
translation.it: Ho un sacco di domande, ma so che non è il momento.

translation.en: I'm gonna go look at some art.
translation.it: Vado ad ammirare un po' di arte.

translation.en: You know, I've been doing some thinking,
and I believe that it would greatly benefit all parties involved
translation.it: e credo che sarebbe un beneficio per tutte le parti coinvolte

translation.en: if Charlie's Kitchen were to become the festival's official food supplier from now on.
translation.it: se da ora Charlie's Kitchen diventasse il ristorante ufficiale del festival.

translation.en: We'd have to work very closely on it, of course.
Well, I happen to know the owner of the restaurant,
translation.it: Si dà il caso che conosca la proprietaria,

translation.en: and maybe you would like to join her for dinner there sometime.
translation.it: e forse una sera ti farebbe piacere unirti a lei per una cena.

translation.en: I would like that very much.
It was my family's dream to make Charlie's Kitchen the heart of the community,
translation.it: Sognavamo che Charlie's Kitchen diventasse il cuore della comunità,

translation.en: to make it feel like home for anyone who stepped inside.
translation.it: che facesse sentire a casa chiunque ci entrasse.

translation.en: Whatever I do in my life, wherever I go,
Charlie's Kitchen will always hold a special place in my heart.
translation.it: Charlie's Kitchen mi resterà sempre nel cuore.

translation.en: They didn't ask anything because they know you're the winner.
translation.it: Non ti hanno intervistato perché hai vinto tu.

translation.en: We'll see.
How many finished paintings do you have not hanging in the restaurant?
translation.it: Hai altri quadri, oltre a quelli al ristorante?

translation.en: Hmm. That I'd want seen? Maybe over a dozen?
translation.it: Che vorrei mostrare? Forse oltre una decina.

translation.en: Then you have enough to have your own showing.
translation.it: Allora bastano per una mostra tutta tua.

translation.en: Would that make you happy? I know the owner here.
translation.it: Ne saresti felice? Conosco il proprietario della galleria.

translation.en: That would be a dream come true.
translation.it: Sarebbe un sogno che si avvera.

translation.en: But what about you? We could show our art together.
Well… you're my dream come true.
translation.it: Beh, sei tu il mio sogno che si avvera.

translation.en: But I'd love that.
The results are in.
All right, before I announce the winner,
translation.it: Bene, prima di annunciare il vincitore,

translation.en: I just want to acknowledge all of the incredible talents over at Charlie's Kitchen who've stepped up for us
translation.it: vorrei ringraziare i grandi talenti del Charlie's Kitchen che ci hanno aiutato

translation.en: this entire Christmas week.
Let's give them a big round of applause.
And now, without further ado,
the winner of this year's Christmas art competition is…
translation.it: il vincitore di quest'anno del concorso di arte di Natale è…

translation.en: With a remarkable personal piece,
the award goes to…
I thought for sure you were gonna win.
I didn't enter the drawing.
Too personal.
Besides, it's yours, not mine, to enter.
translation.it: E poi è tuo, non posso presentarlo io.

translation.en: I don't know what to say.
I do.
Thank you for all the flavor you add to my life.
translation.it: Grazie per il sapore che hai dato alla mia vita.

translation.en: -Okay, you win. -[chuckles]
Oh, I know. I have you.
Merry Christmas, Charlotte.
Merry Christmas, Wyatt.
